action.action-desc: Mr. Duffy introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To impose a civil penalty against a railroad carrier when a shift change of train employees causes a blockage of vehicular traffic at a grade crossing.

section.text: Section 20134 of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: The Secretary shall assess a civil penalty against a railroad carrier in the amount of $10,000 for each complete hour in which a shift change of such carrierâ€™s train employees causes a blockage of vehicular traffic at a grade crossing.
